title: #151: Controlling the Edit and the Narrative of The Staircase
description:
The Real Crime Profile team (Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti) continue their discussion about Kathleen Peterson, Liz Ratliffe and Michael Peterson’s revealing behaviour in the Netflix series "The Staircase."

Listen to this episode and find out the bombshell that gets Lisa Z in a complete spin that The Staircase failed to mention and our analysis of the so-called owl theory. In this episode, we conclude our analysis of The Staircase and the murders of Kathleen Peterson and Liz Ratliffe. 


#HerNameWasKathleenPeterson

#HerNameWasLizRatliffe
